Name: Santiago
Description: The largest and most populous island in Cape Verde, Santiago is home to the capital city, Praia, and is the country s economic and cultural hub.

Name: S達o Vicente
Description: S達o Vicente is known for its vibrant culture, and the city of Mindelo, a port city, is known for its music and festivals.

Name: Santa Luzia
Description: Santa Luzia is an uninhabited island located to the northeast of S達o Vicente. It is part of the Cabo Verdean National Park.

Name: Sal
Description: Sal is one of Cape Verde s most popular tourist destinations, known for its beautiful beaches and resorts, making it a key part of the country s tourism industry.

Name: Boa Vista
Description: Boa Vista is famous for its extensive sandy beaches and dunes. It is one of the main tourist islands in Cape Verde.

Name: Fogo
Description: Fogo is home to an active volcano, Pico do Fogo. The island has fertile soil and is known for its coffee and wine production.

Name: Brava
Description: Brava is the smallest inhabited island of Cape Verde, known for its mountainous terrain and lush vegetation.
